text: Yo broski, Thanks for being there whenever I needed you, from doubt clearing to career counseling, You truly were the best buddy. Hope you achieve your dreams. Milte rahengeðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š
author: Raj  Kumar

text:
Yo Broski, This memoir thing can't even contain the slightest of memories that we have made, but I'll try to recall the best of them. 
Antaragni me Mr and Ms Antaragni ke forms baantne me kaafi maje aaye, wo tera har baar "Mazzza aa gyi" kehna aaj bhi yaad hai. Wo tera har fest se pehle mess me ye kehna ki "Iss baar ek na ek bandi ko approach kar ke rahunga".  Girish ke room pe movies dekhna to Raghav ke room pe poker, Twist song pe Kamar hilana to Sis guard ke samne tera nanga naach , humesha yaad rahega.
Milte hai Banglore me.
author: Raj  Kumar

text:
Yo Broskii!!

One of the most enthusiastic guy that I've met. Odyssey me kaafi kaam karwaya tune, but I'm not complaining though, as the whole wing enjoyed the event because of you motivating us.
You were always there during internship, placement season and whenever I needed you, thanks for that.

Pubg, Valorant me to milte hi rehte hai, real life bhi milte rahenge.
author: Raj  Kumar

text:
Yo Broski!!!
Kaafi maze kre hai tere saath, Teri story telling skills are the best, hadd se hadd serious kisso ko funny way me sunata tha tu.
Teri aur barwal ki RR sunte sunte poora 2nd year nikal gya. Bahut se logo ki maari hai apan ne saath me, Lavesh, Jangid, Harshit to bache jaise the apne, bas parwarish me kami reh gyi thodi.

Mini militia se lekar Poker tak harr jagah kewal CSK jeet ti thi, apan ne kabhi b CSK ka naam dubne nhi diya.

Tera tinder me ladko tk ko right swipe kardena aur fake profiles se katwana, Aur Barwal ka teko chedna humesha yaad rahega.
Humesha Khush rahiyo aur chill maar Banglore ko b C6 bana denge.
author: Raj  Kumar
